transform.name: restoreState

transform.description: The initial state for the registration process

transform.name: saveState
transform.label: Saved State Filename
transform.description: (optional) Filename to which save the final state of the registration

string-vector.name: input_VolumeTypes
string-vector.label: Image Types
string-vector.description: The list of input image types corresponding to the inputVolumes.

string-enumeration.name: atlasToSubjectTransformType
string-enumeration.label: Atlas to Subject Transform Type
string-enumeration.description: What type of linear transform type do you want to use to register the atlas to the reference subject image.

transform.name: atlasToSubjectTransform
transform.label: Atlas to Subject Transform
transform.description: The transform from atlas to the subject

transform.name: atlasToSubjectInitialTransform
transform.label: Atlas to Subject Initial Transform
transform.description: The initial transform from atlas to the subject

string-enumeration.name: subjectIntermodeTransformType
string-enumeration.label: Atlas to Subject Transform Type
string-enumeration.description: What type of transform type do you want to run intra subject registeration. Only Identity and Rigid are allowed.

image.name: output_Volumes
image.label: Output Volumes
image.description: Corrected Output Images: should specify the same number of images as inputVolume, if only one element is given, then it is used as a file pattern where %s is replaced by the imageVolumeType, and %d by the index list location.

string.name: posteriorTemplate
string.label: Posterior Filename Template
string.description: filename template for Posterior output files

parameters.label: Advanced BRAINSABC file parameters
parameters.description: Advanced parameters for the creation of the segmentation file

string-enumeration.label: Resampler InterpoatorType
string-enumeration.name: resamplerInterpolatorType
string-enumeration.description: Type of interpolation to be used when applying transform to moving volume. Options are Linear, NearestNeighbor, BSpline, WindowedSinc, or ResampleInPlace. The ResampleInPlace option will create an image with the same discrete voxel values and will adjust the origin and direction of the physical space interpretation.

integer-vector.name: medianFilterSize
integer-vector.label: Median Filter Size
integer-vector.description: The radius for the optional MedianImageFilter preprocessing in all 3 directions.

float.name: filterTimeStep
float.description: Filter time step should be less than (PixelSpacing/(1^(DIM+1)), value is set to negative, then allow automatic setting of this value.
float.label: Filter Time Step

string-enumeration.name: filterMethod
string-enumeration.label: Filter Method
string-enumeration.description: Filter method for preprocessing of registration

boolean.name: useKNN
boolean.description: Use the KNN stage of estimating posteriors.
boolean.label: Use KNN stage

float.name: purePlugsThreshold
float.label: Threshold Value For PurePlugsMask Computation
float.description: If this threshold value is greater than zero, only pure samples are used to compute the distributions in EM classification, and only pure samples are used for KNN training. The default value is set to 0, that means not using pure plugs. However, a value between 0 and 1 should be set as the threshold if you want to activate using pure plugs option. Empirically a value of 0.1 is suggested.

integer-vector.name: numberOfSubSamplesInEachPlugArea
integer-vector.label: Number of sub-samples taken at each direction inside the plug area to decide whether it is a pure plug or not
integer-vector.description: Number of continous index samples taken at each direction of lattice space for each plug volume.

boolean.name: atlasWarpingOff
boolean.label: Turn off warping from atlas to subject space.
boolean.description: Deformable registration of atlas to subject

integer-vector.name: gridSize
integer-vector.description: Grid size for atlas warping with BSplines
integer-vector.label: BSpline Grid Size

image.name: implicitOutputs
image.label: Implicit Outputs
image.description: Outputs to be made available to NiPype. Needed because not all BRAINSABC outputs have command line arguments.

integer.name: debuglevel
integer.label: Debug option
integer.description: Display debug messages, and produce debug intermediate results. 0=OFF, 1=Minimal, 10=Maximum debugging.

boolean.name: writeLess
boolean.label: Write less
boolean.description: Does not write posteriors and filtered, bias corrected images

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
